venue.address_1: 45 South Main St., Suite 100, West Hartford, CT 06107
venue.name: Wu Healing Center

item.description:
Qi Gong means practicing exercises that allow the Qi to flow throughout the body. Like Yoga, Qi gong has been practiced for thousand of years. This class starts with standing Qi Gong exercises for beginners and then flows into the short form of Yang Style Tai Chi. Tai Chi is the martial art form of moving energy that was created from Qigong 600 years ago. There will be brief meditations integrating breathework with a combination of chanting, gongs, singing bowls, aromatherapy, and drumming at the end of each class.

Class will be meeting every week from 9:30-10:30. $10 per class

contact Erik for more information at 860-593-8397 or chiforhealing.com

item.name: Qi Gong and Tai Chi Class
